RACE.RACE_TEXT: Gladstone Hurdle S. FAR HILLS RACE 1 2 1/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 50000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. 148 lbs. Winners, other than claiming, 3 lbs. extra for each race won. The owner of the winner to receive The Gladstone, a perpetual challenge bowl presented in the memory of Grafton H. Pyne by Mrs. John H. Ewing to be held by the Association, and the owner of the winner to receive a piece of plate. A piece of plate to the rider of the winner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KYOGO (IRE) traveled mid pack, closed steadily on the final turn, led over the last hurdle, kept to task in the stretch to hold off challenger. OUR BOY WES (GB) tracked the leader in second, was under strong urging in stretch to chase leader but unable to gain on the winner. SOUTHPAW MIKE was unhurried at the start, rated, closed willingly on the final turn to gain third. CLIFTON DOWN (IRE) rated, had no finishing kick, finished the course. ANZIO traveled mid pack, tired and was pulled up. ST. JOHN'S traveled mid pack, tired and was pulled up. LIGHTNING RIDGE led the first circuit, tired on teh backstretch the final circuit and was pulled up. KITTEN AROUND was outrun, trailed and was pulled up.

ENTRY.NAME: St. John's
ENTRY.COMMENT: traveled mid pack, tired, pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Clifton Down (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of CHY

ENTRY.COMMENT: rated, no finishing kick, finished course

ENTRY.NAME: Lightning Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: led first circuit, tired, pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Southpaw Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried at start, rated, closed willingly on turn, solid effort

ENTRY.NAME: Kitten Around
ENTRY.OWNER: Upland Flats Racing Dark Horse Racing LLC and Brion Keri
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun, pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Anzio
ENTRY.COMMENT: traveled mid pack, tired, pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Our Boy Wes (GB)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of PUN

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader in second, strong urging in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Kyogo (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of PTH

ENTRY.COMMENT: traveled midpack, closed final turn, led last, kept to task

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Harry E. Harris Hurdle S. FAR HILLS RACE 2 2 1/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 50000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS. 148 lbs. Winners, other claiming, 3 lbs. extra for each race won. The owner of the winner to receive the Harry E. Harris, a perpetual challenge bowl presented in the memory of Harry E. Harris by the late William D. Cleland, to be held by the Association, and the owner of the winner to receive a piece of plate. A piece of plate to the rider of the winner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CALICO (FR) took command at fence three, never headed, increased margin into the final hurdle, drew off handily. CHOSEN JUDGE (IRE) was patiently ridden, roused on the final turn, came wide into the stretch when rallying, finished second best. JUST ANOTHER ONE (IRE) led for two fences, tracked the leader thereafter till the second circuit, was shuffled back on the backstretch, urged on final turn to get up for third not troubling top two. ROCKET ONE went unhurried at the start, produced mild closing rally to pass tired ones. ACTIVE DUTY (FR) was rated, was ridden forward on the final circuit not far off the pace into the final turn, then weakened losing places. AFTERMATH dropped back on the final circuit and was pulled up. TOTAL JOY (IRE) fell two hurdles out.

ENTRY.NAME: Chosen Judge (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: patiently ridden, roused on final turn, wide into stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Aftermath
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back final circuit, pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Calico (FR)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of ROS

ENTRY.OWNER: Del Rio Racing LLC and Goldman Racing Syndicate
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command fence three, never headed, drew off handily

ENTRY.NAME: Just Another One (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: led for two fences, tracked leader, urged on final turn, stayed

ENTRY.NAME: Total Joy (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell two hurdles out

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket One
ENTRY.OWNER: Riverdee Stable and Ten Strike Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried at start, mild closing rally

ENTRY.NAME: Active Duty (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated, ridden forward final circuit close to pace, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Foxbrook Champion Hurdle S. FAR HILLS RACE 3 2 1/2M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 100000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON OVER HURDLES PRIOR TO SEPTEMBER 1, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES, OTHER THAN THREE-YEAR-OLD. Four-year-olds, 144 lbs.; older, 150 lbs. Winners, other than maiden, c laiming, starter, or three-year-old race: 3 lbs. extra for each race won. The owner of the winner to receive the Foxbrook Plate, a perpetual trophy donated by the friends of Mrs. Philip Fanning in memory of her hours of devoted service to the Essex FoxHou nds and the Far Hills Race Meeting Association, to be held by the Association, and the owner of the winner to receive a piece of plate. A piece of plate to the rider of the winner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ABAAN was unhurried from the start, closed steadily on final turn, drew even at the final fence, dueled, driven clear in deep stretchj. THE HERO NEXT DOOR (IRE) was on or up with pace throughout, dueled on the final turn to wire, overtaken in the final strides. L'IMPERATOR (FR) couldn't keep up in late stage. COOL JET (IRE) led on the backstretch the final circuit, then gave way and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: L'Imperator (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: couldn't keep up in late stage

ENTRY.NAME: Cool Jet (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: led on backstretch final circuit, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Abaan
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and Daigneault Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed, drew even final fence, clear deep stretchj

ENTRY.NAME: The Hero Next Door (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: up with pace throughout, dueled final turn to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Peapack Hurdle S. FAR HILLS RACE 4 2 1/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 75000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR FILLIES AND MARES, FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Owner of the winner to receive a cup held by the Association, and the owner of the winner to receive a piece of plate. A piece of plate to the rider of the winner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAY GOODBYE (IRE) stalked in second, riddent to a narrow lead on the backstretch, dueled with RIGHT TEMPO into the final hurdle, driven out in the stretch to prevail. RIGHT TEMPO (FR) rated mid pack, challenged midway on the final turn, briefly led, even with winner last hurdle, then outfinished in the stretch. GOLD CHARM (IRE) was reserved in the rear and produced a mild closing rally to gain third. DURRAGH (IRE) held a stalking position from the start, lacked a finishing kick. CAINUDOTHETWIST traveled mid pack and was never a threat. MET IN MIAMI was never a threat and tired. BELLA COOLA set the pace till final circuit, gave way into the final turn, tired and pulled up. LACEY UNDERALL showed little, trailed in the final circuit and was pulled up.

ENTRY.NAME: Say Goodbye (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of GOW

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked in second, narrow lead backstretch, dueled, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Right Tempo (FR)
ENTRY.OWNER: Potter Group USA LLC and Ashwell Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated mid pack, challenged on turn, even last hurdle, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Met in Miami
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Cainudothetwist
ENTRY.COMMENT: traveled mid pack, never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Charm (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved in rear, mild closing rally to gain third

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Coola
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace till final circuit, tired, pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Durragh (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalking position from start, lacked a finishing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Lacey Underall
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little, trailed final circuit, pulled up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Appleton Hurdle S. FAR HILLS RACE 5 2 5/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 50000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH ARE RATED 130 OR LOWER. The highest rated horse will be assigned 158 lbs. with all other weights adjusted accordingly based on the current ratings. Minimum weight 140 lbs. The owner of the winner to receive the Appleton Cup, a perpetual challenge trophy to be held by the Association, and the owner of the winner to receive a piece of plate. A piece of plate to the rider of the winner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZABEEL CHAMPION (GB) rated nicely, ridden to contention on the final turn circling horses, drew clear in the stretch. FAST VISION (FR) was reserved, closed on the final turn, drew even at the final hurdle, then outfinished in the stretch. REDICEAN (GB) was reserved, produced a mild rally to pass tired ones. PRESENCE OF MIND (IRE) stalked in third, then tired on the final turn. SOVIET PIMPERNEL (IRE) stalked in second place, held a narrow lead when dueling on the final turn, then gave way. WICKED WEST (IRE) trailed. GORDON'S JET (IRE) set the pace to the final turn, dueled with challenger, then tired and dropped back. PROVEN INNOCENT traveled mid pack, tired and was pulled up. RESTITUTION (FR) showed little, tired and was pulled up.

ENTRY.NAME: Gordon's Jet (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace to final turn, tired, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Soviet Pimpernel (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked in second, narrow lead on final turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Redicean (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, mild rally to pass tired ones

ENTRY.NAME: Proven Innocent
ENTRY.COMMENT: traveled mid pack, tired, pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Vision (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, closed final turn, even final hurdle, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Restitution (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little, tired, pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked West (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Zabeel Champion (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Tedham Martin and Wasdell Properties Ltd
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated nicely, ridden to contention final turn, drew clear stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Presence of Mind (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked in third, tired on final turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Grand National Hurdle S. - Grade1 FAR HILLS RACE 6 2 5/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 250000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Four-year-olds, 148 lbs.; older, 156 lbs. The owner of the winner to receive the Grand National, a perpetual challenge trophy to be held by the Association, and the owner of the winner to recei ve a piece of plate. A piece of plate to the trainer of the winner. A piece of plate to the rider of the winner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOAH AND THE ARK (IRE) rated, moved forward on the backstretch the final circuit, chased leaders on the turn, gained lead at the last hurdle, increased margin in the stretch. MERRY MAKER (IRE) was reserved, rallied and closed into the final fence, proved second best. SEDDON (IRE) led from the start, jumped well, was overtaken on the final turn and went one paced thereafter, staying for third. SCORPION'S REVENGE (IRE) traveled unhurried in the rear, passed tired ones at the end. JIMMY P stalked in third position but lacked a closing kick. MORTLACH (GB) was never a threat. SALVADOR ZIGGY (IRE) stalked in second position, then tired before the final hurdle. SNAP DECISION traveled mid pack, then was pulled up on the backstretch on the final circuit.

ENTRY.NAME: Scorpion's Revenge (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried in rear, passed tired ones

ENTRY.NAME: Seddon (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of GAL

ENTRY.COMMENT: led, jumped well, overtaken final turn, one paced in final stage

ENTRY.NAME: Jimmy P
ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC Willis Molly and Willis Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked in third, lacked a closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Snap Decision
ENTRY.COMMENT: traveled mid pack, pulled up on backstretch final circuit

ENTRY.NAME: Noah And The Ark (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated, moved up backstretch, chased on turn, led last, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Salvador Ziggy (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of LIS

ENTRY.OWNER: Hurley William and Hurley Mrs Aisling
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked in second, tired before final hurdle

ENTRY.NAME: Merry Maker (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, rallied and closed into final fence, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Mortlach (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: John Forbes Memorial S. FAR HILLS RACE 7 2M Turf CR: 106. Stakes Purse 100000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. 148 lbs. Non-winners of a stakes race, allowed 4 lbs.; of a race other than maiden or claiming, 8 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MCLOVIN settled close up first circuit, ridden to the lead on the final circuit, held off challengers to prevail. WHO'S COUNTING reserved in the rear, closed on the final turn, gave chase in stretch. RIPTIDE ROCK stalked in second place, pressed the leader on the final turn, then outrun in the stretch. SCANNO rallied on an outside path on the final turn, then outrun in the stretch. CIBOLIAN reserved towards the rear, lacked a finishing rally. CLUBBING set pace on the first circuit, then tired. KING TSUNAMI rated, had no rally and tired. AGITARE (IRE) traveled mid pack, had no rally and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Who's Counting
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved in rear, closed on final turn, gave chase in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: King Tsunami
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated, no rally, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Cibolian
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved towards rear, lack a finishing rally

ENTRY.NAME: Riptide Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked in second, pressed leader on turn, outrun in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Clubbing
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace first circuit, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Agitare (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Willis Molly Willis Paul CFC Stables Kelly Danny Kelly Sheila and L5 Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: traveled mid pack, no rally, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Scanno
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied on outside path final turn, outrun in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: McLovin
ENTRY.COMMENT: ridden to lead final circuit, held off challengers
